summary: Failing to make it on his own, twenty-seven-year-old Jim moves back in with his parents and deals with crippling family obligations.
cast: Casey Affleck|Kevin Corrigan|Mary Kay Place|Seymour Cassel|Rachel Strouse|Sarah Strouse|Rick Duplissie|Liv Tyler|Mark Boone Junior|Jake La Botz|Jack Rovello|Don Strouse|Doug Liechty Caskey|Pam Angell|Nick Boyd|Michael Buscemi|Thomas Friesner
title: Conociendo a Jim
